title: Home
slogan: The new home to MD generation and execution
description:
Welcome to the new Visual Dynamics.
With a renewed interface and a new methodology for generating and running GROMACS simulations, we seek to run simulations with more control in less time.

runs-on-cloud.title: Runs on Cloud
runs-on-cloud.description: MD demands time, computational power, and even more computational power, so you can rely on us to this. We run 3 simultaneous MDs, with 10 CPU cores each.

open-source.title: Free for... everyone
open-source.description: We know running a MD is not something easy, with this in mind, we develop this piece of software to automate  as a free and open-source software. Run on our hardware, your hardware, deploy your own, it is totally up to you.
